settings.title: Effortless Business Setup in Dubai and the UAE
settings.class: m-0 animate-fadeInOut w-[1140px] relative text-53xl leading-[80px] font-normal font-inherit text-center inline-block max-w-full mq450:text-24xl mq450:leading-[50px] mq850:text-39xl mq850:leading-[64px]

settings.editor: Focus on running your business in Dubai, and let us handle the heavy lifting.

settings.class: cursor-pointer border-transparent py-[21px] px-10 bg-general-1-primary overflow-hidden flex flex-row items-start justify-start whitespace-nowrap hover:bg-elements-neutral-4 hover:text-general-1-primary hover:border-general-1-primary border-solid border-[2px] text-general-white hover:text-general-1-primary

settings.editor: We totally get it. New company formation in UAE—especially in Dubai, can feel highly, highly overwhelming. Let no one tell you otherwise—it’s a stress you don’t want to take on alone. That’s why Vision Prime is here to handle the heavy lifting for you.
Whether you’re setting up a mainland, free zone, or offshore company, Vision Prime is ready to guide you through every step with personalized, high-touch services.
